<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_442386_grocmgr_invoice_lineitem</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Test LineItem Insert</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	gs.info('current.number: '+current.number);
	gs.info('current.invoice.number: '+current.invoice.number);
	gs.info('current.item.number: '+current.item.number);
	
	var inv = new GlideRecord('x_442386_grocmgr_invoice');
	inv.addQuery('number', current.invoice.number);
	
	if(inv.next())
	{
		gs.info("Invoice found");
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-31 20:13:01</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>21d652771b22001082ecdd3cdc4bcb3b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Test LineItem Insert</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Grocery Manager" source="x_442386_grocmgr">1b6b82931b12001082ecdd3cdc4bcb91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Grocery Manager">1b6b82931b12001082ecdd3cdc4bcb91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_21d652771b22001082ecdd3cdc4bcb3b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-03 20:00:37</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=21d652771b22001082ecdd3cdc4bcb3b"/></record_update>
